Articles.Content:
With recent discussion about the random name generation for Kerbals in Kerbal Space Program, sal\_vager sparked an idea, which I am hereby bringing to life.

I had the idea that if two Kerbals had the same name, then their stats would be identical, seeing as Kerbal stats and professions are generated based on the random coupling of syllables that resulted in their name. So, in the interest of the ever-scientific concept of *classification* (imagine fanfares playing here), I thought it might be a bit fun to try and compile a list of Kerbal names so you know what you're getting into before hiring a specific Kerbonaut, should he/she apply to join your space program! 

All names that I list here will be in alphabetical order, both following the first letter of their names and also within their specific letter spoilers.

In addition, I may be able to perhaps reverse-engineer some of the random name generation, and find out exactly what kind of prefixes and suffixes are being strung together to form names. It's all in the name of Science, people!

And so I call upon the various space programs: Give me the names of your brave Kerbonauts, that I might mark down their attributes!

**SUBMISSION PROCEDURE**

1. Submit name of a Kerbal.

2. List their gender.

3. List their profession.

4. List their Courage and Stupidity Stats (from 0 to 1, found in the persistence file of your save)

5. List their state of BadS.

SAMPLE SUBMISSION:

> 
> Jebediah Kerman
> Male
> 
> Pilot
> 
> Courage: .5
> 
> Stupidity: .5
> 
> BadS: True

> 
> N/A

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-22T14:15:51Z" title="05/22/2015 02:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 22, 2015</time> by Maximus97**

Lere Kerman

Female

Pilot

Courage: 7

Stupidity: 5

BadS: True

She landed on Moho with RCS and then returned to Kerbin and got me 2500 science missing half her ship, the docking port and half the RCS thrusters
Ooh, excellent! I expect to see some interesting stories about you guys's Kerbals!

I only wish it were possible to list Dandy Kerman (he's a dandy Kerman... in space), but alas. Though I do have one brave pioneer of note on my team:

Zellian Kerman

Female

Scientist

Courage: 7

Stupidity: 3

BadS: False

She is single-handedly responsible for gathering all of the scientific data known to Kerbalkind about Minmus AND the Mun. Though Valentina accompanied her to Minmus, Zellian did the entire Mun science run solo.

Nanica Kerman

Female

Scientist

Courage: 6

Stupidity: 7

BadS: Very\_False 

Rescued by KASE star pilot Valentina from an inclined retrograde orbit out at about Munar orbital distance. Continued panicking even after aboard Rescue 1. Previously employed by USI ltd.

(note: I'm not 100% sure how to check the exact number on Courage / Stupidity or BadS. Courage is a little more than half and stupidity is about 3/4 full in the astronaut complex. While Valentina was happy as a clam throughout the mission, Nanica was still hyperventilating for quite some time after being rescued).

Billy-Boblock Kerman

Male

Engineer

Brave: 7

Stupidity: 2

BadS: False

Likes to climb into cockpits he wasn't invited to.

> 
> (note: I'm not 100% sure how to check the exact number on Courage / Stupidity or BadS)

To do this, you go into your KSP folder. You go to where it says "Saves" and find the folder of the save you want to find the Kerbal in. Then you go to the persistence file and almost all the way to the bottom. Your Kerbals are there.
